primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: A 'history-bearing group' of enlightened individuals must exercise their God-given freedom and mental equipment to dismantle social injustice and establish a democratic/Christian humanism.

subject.identificatie: The 'History-bearing group' / The Hearer as 'The Responsible'
tekstueel_bewijs: They register their impatience and signal their determination
they are the chosen of God to proclaim the fullness of time
we are under imperious orders to commit ourselves to his purposes
open the gates of new life to all humankind
the kingdoms of this world are become the kingdoms of our Lord
God in his wisdom endowed humankind with that precious and perilous gift
laws of nature and of nature's God
men and women everywhere and of every estate

helper.identificatie: Human Reason, Conscience, and the Example of Jesus
tekstueel_bewijs: equipment of minds created so that they are able to grasp ideas
enlightened and empowered by those examples which God has given us
indigenous prejudices of region or race
tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: The opponent is primarily external social structures or internal 'prejudices' that can be overcome by 'reason' and 'determination'.

secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The Soteriological work of Christ on the Cross.
secundair_narratief_programma.subject: Christ
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: The work of Christ is used as a 'modal endowment' (giving the human subject the power to act) rather than the primary story itself. Calvary is a 'levelness' that facilitates human social action.

voorbeelden_god_subject: God in his wisdom endowed humankind
He has not left himself without witnesses
voorbeelden_mens_subject: They move under an imperious faith
We are under imperious orders to commit ourselves

voorbeelden: mandates us to use our freedom
under responsibility to think beyond slogans
minds created so that they are able to grasp ideas
competence for which God... has given

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon assumes the hearer already possesses the 'Savoir' (Reason) and 'Pouvoir' (Endowment) and focuses almost exclusively on 'Devoir' (Obligation) to act.

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: From S2 (Slavery) to S1 (Responsibility) via the endowment of Reason (~S2).
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: Resolution is achieved through human commitment and 'vocational consciousness.'
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: S2 is seen as a social/political condition rather than an ontological state of sin.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: While using high Christological language at the end, the engine of the sermon is the 'history-bearing group.' God is the 'Endower' and 'Sender,' but Man is the 'Subject' of the progress toward the Kingdom.

indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: God has granted us equipment and example.
our tortured generation may yet be known as the Age of Freedom.

indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: all have sinned, and come short of the glory of God

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: Jesus is presented as the ultimate 'Example' and 'Witness' rather than the sole Actor of salvation.
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: Instead of 'Jesus honored freedom,' the text could say 'Jesus liberates the captive who has no freedom of choice.'

identificatie_patroon.effect_op_hoorder: Inflation of the ego; burden of history-making.
identificatie_patroon.theologische_implicatie: Synergism where God provides the tools and man provides the labor.

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: The transition from Enlightenment 'Rights of Man' to the 'Cross of Christ' is rhetorically smooth but actantially clunky.
spanning_punten: The 'uninalienable rights' of the Deist Creator vs the 'sin' mentioned in the Romans quote.

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: He has not left himself without witnesses... enlightened and empowered by those examples.

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: Endowment of 'Mind' at creation rather than 'Grace' at conversion.

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: Sin is primarily 'prejudice' or 'bigotry'—things that can be reasoned away.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The sermon functions as a recruitment speech for social activists, using God as the source of their credentials rather than the Subject of their rescue.

subject_herpositionering.voorgestelde_herpositionering: Make Christ the Subject who breaks the chains of both the slave and the master.
subject_herpositionering.voorbeeld_revisie: Instead of 'We must commit our freedom,' use 'Christ has seized us in our bondage to set us free for others.'

identificatie_herstel.voorgestelde_identificatie: Hearer as the 'Receiver' of a freedom they could not create.
identificatie_herstel.strategie: Emphasize the 'Passivity' of being 'Christ-touched' before the 'Activity' of responsibility.

modale_balans.concrete_suggestie: Focus on how the Spirit enables the 'new creature' to love, rather than the 'mind' to reason.

tegenstander_intensivering.voorgestelde_intensivering: The 'Demonic orders' mentioned briefly should be treated as powers no human 'reason' can defeat.
tegenstander_intensivering.theologische_rationale: To make the Cross necessary rather than just 'enlightening'.

narratieve_hierarchie_herstel.voorgestelde_structuur: 1. Christ frees the helpless. 2. The freed person serves.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: The sermon is rhetorically magnificent but structurally Pelagian. It risks exhausting the hearer by making them the pivot of history.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: Rhetorically, this is a masterpiece of civil rights oratory. Actantially, it is anthropocentric.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: The exegesis of Joshua and Matthew ignores the 'Law' function, turning them into 'Options' for the free subject.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Greimas reveals that 'God' is merely a 'Helper' providing 'Equipment' for the human 'Subject's' quest.

appendices.notities: The sermon relies heavily on Enlightenment philosophy (Tillich, Jefferson) to define the actantial roles.
